name: profile-card
author: abhijeet-singhh
preview: A stylish profile card with avatar, name, bio, social media links, and a View Portfolio button.

props.name: avatarUrl
props.description: URL of the profile avatar image

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the person displayed on the card

props.name: socialLinks
props.description: Object containing URLs for social media profiles (e.g. twitter, github, linkedin)

props.name: onViewPortfolio
props.description: Callback function triggered when the View Portfolio button is clicked
